    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void backToMenu(Object button)
      Returns the Controller to the menu state following the pressed object.
      void buttonPressed(Object button)
      Defines which function to call depending on the button pressed and the state of the Controller.
      String deleteOneDigit(String string)
      Delete the last char from a string.
      StatusATM getStatus()
      Returns the current state of the Controller.
      void menuSelection(Object button)
      Management of menu selection.Once the menu option is selected it updates the status of the Controller.
      void moneyRequest(Object button)
      Management of money request.Once the required money is available and in the correct format (multiples of 10 and not 0), it disburses the money and updates the status of the Controller.
      void moneyReset()
      Resets the requested money to an empty string.
      void resetControllerBasic()
      Resets the Controller, setting its status to basic menu.
      void resetViewBasic()
      Resets the View to the basic menu screen: basic menu message, card insertion possibility off and money withdrawal deactivated.
      void setStatus(StatusATM status)
      Sets the current state of the controller.
